channel.title: Moparscape Client Fronzing
channel.description:
well, some times when im playing with moparscrap client and it Fronze! Just Fronze, so i need to restart the client to still playing i hate it, some times it hard to heppens, but some times it heppens in about 5 in 5 min O.o some on help plz?
and i cant use other clients bcuz when i try run it heppens: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/1741/copilercl8.jpg[/img][/URL]
